decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan; Received 25/04/2016; XEVA/112TC/101 Rev B; XEVA/112TC/102 Rev B; received 12/04/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the outbuilding hereby permitted shall be constructed in red brick and tiles to match those used in the main house.

Condition : 4 - The use of the outbuilding for storage/gym purposes hereby permitted shall remain ancillary and subservient to the primary use of this residential site, and shall not become a separate or dominant use at any time.
description: Erection of a single storey outbuilding at the rear garden of the house.
